data.description_html: This spell enables you to command deathless creatures for a short period of time. You command the creatures by voice, and the creatures understand you no matter what language you speak. Even if vocal communication is impossible (in the area of a silence spell, for instance), the controlled deathless do not attack you. At the end of the spell, the controlled deathless revert to their normal behavior. Intelligent deathless remember that you controlled them.
data.name: Control Deathless
data.target: Up to 2 HD of deathless creatures/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
